title: The Asset Allocator: A Fine Analysis From J.P. Morgan
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: A 2020 investment outlook from J.P. Morgan Asset Management offers a perceptive macro-analysis. This podcast (6:03) suggests that we not look to these outlooks for their investment recommendations, but as an exercise in thinking, to deepen our understanding of markets, something this analysis succeeds at. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
